channel.title: Lua on Dynamic Simulation Environment
channel.description: Recent content in Lua on Dynamic Simulation Environment

item.title: Model - Lua Model/MCL
item.description: Synposis Run models written in Lua using the Lua Model Library and operated via the built-in Lua MCL (Model Compatibility Library). Lua Model using the Lua Model Library and Lua MCL Interface function model_step() model:log_notice("model_step() @ %f", model:model_time()) -- Increment the counter signal. local counter = model.sv["signal"].scalar[SIG_COUNTER] counter = counter + 1 model.sv["signal"].scalar[SIG_COUNTER] = counter -- Indicate success. return 0 end Model Structure examples/csv └── sim ├── data │ └── simulation.
